metadata.name: Academic/Technical Document Dictionary Template
metadata.notes: For academic papers, technical documents, reports, etc.

proper_nouns._comment: Names, institutions, places that need consistent translation

domain_terms._comment: Document-specific technical terms only. Do NOT add common academic/technical words - let the translator handle them naturally.

preserve_original._comment: Terms to keep in original language (with optional translation in parentheses on first occurrence)

style_notes._comment: Translator preserves the original document's formality and tone. Add notes only if specific adjustments are needed.
